hanzi-su-wiki:
暫

Значения

Некоторое (короткое) время; в течение долгого времени, давно

Мнемоника

Отсрочка казни четвертованием 斬 на несколько дней 日.

Варианты

暂

(Simplified: 暂)
Antonyms: 久
Pictophonetic: 斬 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
暫時 [ zàn shí ]: temporary; provisional; for the time being
暫行 [ zàn xíng ]: provisional
暫停 [ zàn tíng ]: to suspend; time-out (e.g. in sports); stoppage; pause (media player)
暫且 [ zàn qiě ]: for now; for the time being; temporarily

heisig_chinese_memo: I made some mistakes when hewing my car into a convertible so now it needs some work. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: temporarily, executioner, chop off, car, axe, sun, day
Keyword_KANJIDIC: temporarily, a while, moment, long time
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: временно, некоторое время, момент, долгое время
koohiiStory1: Your car has been savagely (see steadily) attacked by an ax. It will be some days before your car is fixed. So you are temporarily without car.
koohiiStory2: Today is Car Axe Day. The day where you can temporarily (today only) attack cars using an axe without punishment.
jp_example_words: 暫く(しばらく): little while
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: To your car you take an axe. The sun has broken your car for good this time (you think). You're so angry at your car. You think this is permanent. Turns out, though, that it's not permanent. It's just like that temporarily. You did make it permanent by taking an axe to your car, though.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel sad that you were the one to destroy your car for good, even though the sun messed it up temporarily.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You were driving around in Zanzibar (ざん) when this happened, too, so now you're stuck in Zanzibar, a foreign place, and you have no idea what to do next.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You should probably be worried about this situation.
Ru_Meaning: temporarily, a while, moment, long time
Ru_trainchinese:
zàn: (графема) короткий, недолгий, кратковременный
zàn: (нареч) пока что, временно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you kill (斬) for a day (日) temporarily
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Hew for a day and you will definitely need to make a temporary stop and get some rest.  It's tough work!
humanum_full_description_en:
From " day ", " cut " sound. The original meaning is short time and soon. "Said Wen": "For the time being, soon. From the day, cut the sound." Such as "Wen Xuan. Zhang Pingzi "Xijing Fu": "Gaozu started his own business and inherited the foundation. Work forever forever, rule by doing nothing." "Liezi. "Yang Zhu": "The people of the primordial age will come temporarily when they know their lives, and they will go temporarily when they know their deaths.

" Temporary " means suddenly or suddenly. Such as "Historical Records. General Li's Biography: "(Li) rushed to the Hu'er horse for a short time. He pushed his bow down and flicked his horse for dozens of miles south. He regained the rest of the army and was drawn into the congestion.” Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty <Night>: "Temporarily recall the Jiangdong River, and get off the boat with snow."

" Temporary " means just and beginning. Such as "Lun Heng. Misfortune": "When I heard about it and saw it temporarily, everyone thought it was true; I was familiar with it, but it was false." "Book of Jin. "Liu Cong Zaiji": "The lower officials are eager to say something, but they are reincarnated by virtue and not relative to the emperor. They are afraid that the loyalty will be temporarily released. The prestige of the cream is already reached, so I dare not hear it."

" Temporary " also means temporarily, temporarily. Such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Miscellaneous songs. "Jiao Zhongqing's Wife": "Qing, but I will return home for the time being, and I will report to the mansion today." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Drinking Alone under the Moon": "Temporarily accompanied by the moon and the shadows, the joy must be in spring."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " day ", the sound of " cut ". The original meaning is short time and soon.
humanum_full_description:
從「日」，「斬」聲。本義是短時間、不久。《說文》：「暫，不久也。从日，斬聲。」如《文選．張平子〈西京賦〉》：「高祖創業，繼體承基。暫勞永逸，無為而治。」《列子．楊朱》：「太古之人知生之暫來，知死之暫往。」

　　「暫」表示突然、忽然。如《史記．李將軍列傳》：「（李）廣暫騰而上胡兒馬，因推墮兒，取其弓，鞭馬南馳數十里，復得其餘軍，因引而入塞。」唐代杜甫〈夜〉：「暫憶江東鱠，兼懷雪下船。」

　　「暫」表示剛、初。如《論衡．禍虛》：「始聞暫見，皆以為然；熟考論之，虛妄言也。」《晉書．劉聰載記》：「下官亟欲有所言矣，但以德非更生，親非皇宗，恐忠言暫出，霜威已及，故不敢耳。」

　　「暫」也表示姑且、暫且。如《樂府詩集．雜曲歌辭．焦仲卿妻》：「卿但暫還家，吾今且報府。」唐代李白〈月下獨酌〉：「暫伴月將影，行樂須及春。」
humanum_short_description: 從「日」，「斬」聲。本義是短時間、不久。

暫く(しばらく): little while

從「 日 」，「 斬 」聲。本義是短時間、不久。《說文》：「暫，不久也。从日，斬聲。」如《文選．張平子〈西京賦〉》：「高祖創業，繼體承基。暫勞永逸，無為而治。」《列子．楊朱》：「太古之人知生之暫來，知死之暫往。」 「 暫 」表示突然、忽然。如《史記．李將軍列傳》：「（李）廣暫騰而上胡兒馬，因推墮兒，取其弓，鞭馬南馳數十里，復得其餘軍，因引而入塞。」唐代杜甫〈夜〉：「暫憶江東鱠，兼懷雪下船。」 「 暫 」表示剛、初。如《論衡．禍虛》：「始聞暫見，皆以為然；熟考論之，虛妄言也。」《晉書．劉聰載記》：「下官亟欲有所言矣，但以德非更生，親非皇宗，恐忠言暫出，霜威已及，故不敢耳。」 「 暫 」也表示姑且、暫且。如《樂府詩集．雜曲歌辭．焦仲卿妻》：「卿但暫還家，吾今且報府。」唐代李白〈月下獨酌〉：「暫伴月將影，行樂須及春。」
From " day", " cut" sound. The original meaning is short time and soon. "Said Wen": "For the time being, soon. From the day, cut the sound." Such as "Wen Xuan. Zhang Pingzi "Xijing Fu": "Gaozu started his own business and inherited the foundation. Work forever forever, rule by doing nothing." "Liezi. "Yang Zhu": "The people of the primordial age will come temporarily when they know their lives, and they will go temporarily when they know their deaths. " Temporary" means suddenly or suddenly. Such as "Historical Records. General Li's Biography: "(Li) rushed to the Hu'er horse for a short time. He pushed his bow down and flicked his horse for dozens of miles south. He regained the rest of the army and was drawn into the congestion.” Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty : "Temporarily recall the Jiangdong River, and get off the boat with snow." " Temporary" means just and beginning. Such as "Lun Heng. Misfortune": "When I heard about it and saw it temporarily, everyone thought it was true; I was familiar with it, but it was false." "Book of Jin. "Liu Cong Zaiji": "The lower officials are eager to say something, but they are reincarnated by virtue and not relative to the emperor. They are afraid that the loyalty will be temporarily released. The prestige of the cream is already reached, so I dare not hear it." " Temporary" also means temporarily, temporarily. Such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Miscellaneous songs. "Jiao Zhongqing's Wife": "Qing, but I will return home for the time being, and I will report to the mansion today." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Drinking Alone under the Moon": "Temporarily accompanied by the moon and the shadows, the joy must be in spring."

暫字的基本解释

暫
zàn
见“暂”。

暫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zàn］
［《廣韻》藏濫切，去闞，從。］
“暂1”的繁体字。亦作“蹔1”。
(1)须臾；短时间。
(2)副词。突然。
(3)副词。刚刚；刚才。
(4)副词。犹一旦；一经。
(5)副词。暂且；暂时。
(6)副词。即，便。
(7)通“漸”。欺诈。
(8)通“漸”。始，初。

暫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页499第15
【唐韻】藏濫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】昨濫切，?音鏨。【說文】不久也。【類篇】須臾也。【書·盤庚】暫遇姦宄。【左傳·僖三十三年】婦人暫而免諸國。【註】暫，猶卒也。　【五經文字】暫作蹔，訛。

暫字的源字形

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
暫字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［zàn］
["Guangyun" Tibetan indiscriminate cutting, go to Kan, from. ]
Traditional characters of "時1". Also known as "蹔1".
(1) Short-term; short time.
(2) Adverbs. suddenly.
(3) Adverbs. Just now; just now.
(4) Adverbs. Once; once.
(5) Adverbs. For the time being; For the time being.
(6) Adverbs. even if.
(7) Through "gradual". Fraud.
(8) Through "gradual". Beginning, beginning.

Name meaning

zàn
вм. 暂
Radicals: 車, 斤, 日  (car, axe, sun)
Meaning Mnemonic
To your car you take an axe. The sun has broken your car for good this time (you think). You're so angry at your car. You think this is permanent. Turns out, though, that it's not permanent. It's just like that temporarily. You did make it permanent by taking an axe to your car, though.
Feel sad that you were the one to destroy your car for good, even though the sun messed it up temporarily.
Reading Mnemonic
You were driving around in Zanzibar (ざん) when this happened, too, so now you're stuck in Zanzibar, a foreign place, and you have no idea what to do next.
You should probably be worried about this situation.
